title: 8. Mine Action and Cluster Munitions Programme 2016 -2020
description: HALO is funded to deliver a 48-month project in Kosovo with a total cost of $763,208 to clear minefields and NATO cluster munition strikes. $381,604 is being provided by the Dutch Government to conduct landmine and cluster munitions clearance. This will be matched by a private donor committed to providing matched funding to HALO for the clearance of all remaining minefields in the country.
